spell.more_rpg_classes.wild_rage.name: Wild Rage
spell.more_rpg_classes.wild_rage.descrip: Enters Rage attacks faster and deals more damage but also receives more.
spell.more_rpg_classes.bloody_strike.des: Heavy blow that deals {damage} physical damage, regenerates the player.
spell.more_rpg_classes.nordic_storm.name: Nordic Storm
spell.more_rpg_classes.nordic_storm.desc: Spinning attack, that deals {damage} physical damage around the player.
spell.more_rpg_classes.undertow.name: Undertow
spell.more_rpg_classes.undertow.descript: Throws both axes for a small range, deals damage.
spell.more_rpg_classes.rumbling_swing.de: Jumps in a straight direction and damages enemies.
spell.more_rpg_classes.stonehand.name: Stonehand
spell.more_rpg_classes.stonehand.descrip: Increases damage, decreases attack speed. Chance to stun enemies with a knuckle.
spell.more_rpg_classes.asal.name: Asalraalaikum
spell.more_rpg_classes.asal.description: Fully concentraded strike that deals arcane and melee damage, which exhausts the player heavily.
spell.more_rpg_classes.barq_esna.name: Baraqijal Esna
spell.more_rpg_classes.barq_esna.descrip: Debuffs the entity. Arcane Spells deal more damage and have a higher chance to crit.
spell.more_rpg_classes.burstcrack.name: Burst Crack
spell.more_rpg_classes.burstcrack.descri: Smashes the ground hard, damages enemies and knocks them up.
spell.more_rpg_classes.quen.name: Quen
spell.more_rpg_classes.quen.description: Gives you a absorption effect and clears all effects.
spell.more_rpg_classes.igni.name: Igni
spell.more_rpg_classes.igni.description: Compromised pyrokinetic burst that ignites enemies and deals {damage} damage.
spell.more_rpg_classes.aard.name: Aard
spell.more_rpg_classes.aard.description: Telekinetik thrust that knocks enemies back and deals small {damage} damage.
Deals frost damage around the player, knocks enemies back and freezes them solid.
spell.more_rpg_classes.igni_firestream_m: A continuos stream of fire that sets enemy´s on fire and melts their armor.
